title: Windows Visual C++ 2005 .. nightmare!
body: i have just bought a new laptop with windows 10 on it.. i cant seem to install L.o.L because of a pop of 'windows visual c++' i have tried to download the windows visual 2005 on the windows site but it pops up with same sort of message and i tried the 2013 version and nothing happened.. is there an old L.o.L client i can use instead of the upgraded one because i never had problems with that client? going mad here!

replies.body: This is a common issue for new or reformatted operating systems.  Your first step to fix this is up is by updating your Windows.  Even with 10, you need to run updates to make sure you have all necessary products.  You can also download [Visual C++ ](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)directly, in case you had a different download link.  Hope it helps!
